definition: to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Thellonking is one of the most productive activities a human being can undertake.
sentences.chinese: 念考是此中最出產性活動己的總稱能夠舉行。

sentences.english: J: You have a very busy life. Lots of a week activies.
sentences.chinese: 你生活很充實啊，有很多的活動。

sentences.english: Pregame warming-up practice on shooting! It does help.
sentences.chinese: 賽前準備活動投籃練習，是很有幫助的。

sentences.english: Pray for the government to halt its campaign of targeting Christians .
sentences.chinese: 禱告政府會停止以基督徒爲箭靶的活動。

sentences.english: This is the ancient origins of the rise of Buddhism and Taoism in the pre-existing folk activities.
sentences.chinese: 這是源流古者在佛道教興起前就有的民俗活動。

sentences.english: More dramatic is the introduction of goal-driven search engine marketing campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 更戲劇性的是，目標驅動的搜索引擎營銷活動的介紹。

sentences.english: The system can even be used to spot rip currents in real time.
sentences.chinese: 這個系統甚至可以捕捉到實時的海流活動。

sentences.english: The candidate's campaign was attended with too much ballyhoo .
sentences.chinese: 這個候選人的競選活動致力於太多的大舉造勢。

sentences.english: No junketing activity would be conducted on official expenses without permission of the company.
sentences.chinese: 在未得到公司授權情況下，不得以公費進行宴請活動。

sentences.english: You can get the norwalk virus from hand to mouth activity or from contaminated food.
sentences.chinese: 你可以得到手諾瓦克病毒污染的食物或活動口。

sentences.english: The fourth section analysis the literary work of people who walk into political field by examination.
sentences.chinese: 第四節分析評述科舉入仕之工商子弟的文學創作活動。

sentences.english: Mr. Ayers is not involved in my campaign.
sentences.chinese: 艾爾斯沒有參與我的任何競選活動。

sentences.english: He said he could not bear such internal sabotage any longer.
sentences.chinese: 他說，他再也不能忍受這種內部的陰謀活動了。

sentences.english: At the activity class, I helped our teacher to make the music.
sentences.chinese: 在活動課上，我幫助我的英語老師剪輯音樂。

sentences.english: Dynamic reliability analysis and compare of rail based on random process over-crossing theory;
sentences.chinese: 基於隨機過程理論對物流活動中的庫存管理進行優化。

sentences.english: The activities of Regional Alliances will conform to the Rules for Regional Alliances of ICOM National Committees.
sentences.chinese: 地區聯盟旳活動應遵守自身旳程序規則。

definition: the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
